Text: RE rapscallion in th kitchenI never thought of velveeta as a dessert type ingredient Although I DO have a lb brick at home so I have enough for BOTH recipes Nasty Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday October PM To Shelton Karin Subject RE rapscallion in th kitchen Okay it is a slow day at the office Here are recipes I found on the Internet May be time to throw a White Trash party DOTS CREAMY FUDGE lb margarine lb Velveeta cheese Tbsp vanilla lb powdered sugar cup Hersheys cocoa cup nuts chopped Melt margarine Velveeta cheese and vanilla in double boiler Remove from heat Add powdered sugar cocoa and nuts Mix together well This sets up fast Press in buttered casserole dish Makes about pounds good fudge VELVEETA CHEESE FUDGE lb butter or margarine lb Velveeta cheese cup cocoa Tbsp vanilla lb powdered sugar to cup nuts Slowly melt butter and Velveeta Can be done in microwave Add cocoa and vanilla Mix well Add powdered sugar and nuts Mix well This will be very stiff The last pound of powdered sugar may need to be added and mixed by hand Pour into buttered cookie sheet or x inch cake pans This makes about pounds of very creamy and delicious fudge Stores well Shelton Karin on PM To cc Subject RE rapscallion in th kitchen Mmm Th house did smell a bit oniony and I actually DID wonder even though I had used small onyons if I had used too many I actually had cooked WAY too much chicken They were pretty huge chicken breasts so maybe I will mix some of that stuff up for us from the leftover ingredients I totally overbought on Velveeta minor grocery store freakout I guess so we can make lots o trashy Velveeta foods I was in bed by so it wasnt so bad Karin Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday October PM To Shelton Karin Subject Re rapscallion in th kitchen Lawd have mercy hope your dish turned out great and you didnt use too many dem onyons Mm

RE Susans busy weekhad a busy Halloween at school Big kids dressed up trick or treated at all the classrooms and bug was the only baby still awake during this time so they put her in a high chair to watch all of the action She fell asleep on the short ride home which she never does We bought her an outifit to wear at Old Navy thats not really a costume It is an orange one piece thing with these cute smiling spiders on it that says silly spiders It was a little boyish but the pumpkin motif suit was on white tshirt material and I knew it would be totally stained by the end of the day The orange hid those pesky carrots and peaches We took pictures of her holding on to the gourd jackolantern yesterday morning I think she enjoyed watching the kids come to our door for candy but she really didnt like the doorbell much at all The Hamlets slummed it and left their million dollar house area of Alamo Heights to come trick or treat on the old street They brought new baby whose name sounds like Frayton not sure how to spell but it was fun to see them again Well we will hook up another weekend but in the meantime I will send portraits and hopefully some other pics your way Karin Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday November AM To Shelton Karin Subject Re Susans busy week Hi Sorry to hear about the stomach virus and I hope you are feeling much better Just back from Cali It was a fun trip Im in need of a Bug fix especially after comparing niecenephew notes with and bragging a lot to Sue Edd and Craig over the weekend Unfortunately I have to stay in Houston this weekend for a wedding Was contemplating visiting the weekend of Nov but you know thats totally DEs call If you mail photos Id suggest sending to me at my office co Enron Transportation Services Smith St Room very important Houston That way they will not get mangled or wet Did you dress the little one up for Halloween Have a good day Shelton Karin on PM To cc Subject austin OK Since our last attempt to go to Austin was foiled by a bout of stomach virus we will go THIS weekend for much needed wig control Might you be available for a visit Just thought Id clue you in since you havent seen bug for a while I picked up her portraits today at lunch and they look good If we meet in Austin this weekend I will hand deliver otherwise Ill mail or FedEx What address would you prefer home or office Let me know Karin The information in this email is confidential and may be legally privileged It is intended solely for the addressee Access by any other person to this email is not authorized If you are not the intended recipient please delete this email Any disclosure of this email or of the parties to it any copying distribution or any action taken or omitted to be taken in reliance on it is prohibited and may be unlawful

RE message from Santado All lists are currently under construction Will you forward your list as well I decided to wait until Thanksgiving to give you Gs portrait is that okay with you I CAN send it sooner if you prefer Her school pics are in now too Sorry I didnt call back last night We were toy shopping with Grandma Sally and then it was time for dinner etc etc and got a call from Mema where she immediately launched into all of her health problems Was Dreamy Eric to your liking Original Message From mailto Sent Monday November PM To Karin Shelton Subject message from Santa Santa is going on a trip to Costa Rica right before Christmas and would like to finish shopping er making gifts prior to the tripnot to mention Santa has a very busy party schedule once December gets under way wish lists for you Jim and Pnut would be much appreciated

RE ideascan give you ideas for bug at Thanksgiving The specific toys that i wanted for her have been purchased by aqua grandma but she needs some more Her old toys are becoming too babyish for her I havent had the time to scout out the toy departments yet One thing that would be good is if someone could see if that Sesame Street album exists the one that I had I am progressing somewhat on her list but items are very nonspecific We will probably arrive in Austin on Thursday morning and stay nights I heard that Mems is arriving on Wed Is she actually going to drive Karin Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday November AM To Shelton Karin Subject Re ideas No she keeps promising to but I do not have any yet We should sit her down after Thanksgiving dinner and help her make a list of what she needs I only need to shop for her and Grayson I have everyone else covered I have been a shoppin fool What are your travel plans S Shelton Karin on AM To cc Subject ideas Hi Has Mum given you any gift ideas for her birthdayChristmas Karin The information in this email is confidential and may be legally privileged It is intended solely for the addressee Access by any other person to this email is not authorized If you are not the intended recipient please delete this email Any disclosure of this email or of the parties to it any copying distribution or any action taken or omitted to be taken in reliance on it is prohibited and may be unlawful
